name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - liothyronine (including Armour Thyroid and liothyronine combination products)
title: Liothyronine cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Liothyronine is used to treat an underactive thyroid. It has a very high cost and limited evidence.
It is sometimes used in combination with levothyroxine in products. Most patients can have symptoms controlled
The manufacturer has been the subject of a Competition and Markets Authority investigation.
